cheatdetector.config.alert.alertBuffer.c: How many VLs should we space out before sending an alert?
cheatdetector.config.alert.allowAlert.co: Should we show alerts in chat when a player violates? (Only you will see it)
cheatdetector.config.alert.allowAlertFix: Should we send alerts to chat when abnormal packets are monitored?
cheatdetector.config.alert.allowAlertVLC: Should we show alerts in chat when clearing a player's violations
cheatdetector.config.alert.disableBuffer: If the buffer is disabled, every alert will be displayed in chat.
cheatdetector.config.alert.prefix.commen: What's should we display before alert message? (support color code)
cheatdetector.config.alert.prefix.name: Alert Prefix
cheatdetector.config.anticheat.VLClearTi: How long should we wait before clear vl? (-1 to never clear)
cheatdetector.config.anticheat.antiCheat: If enabled, we will start counting player violations.
cheatdetector.config.anticheat.threshold: How much extra distance should we provide the player before marking?
cheatdetector.config.fixes.omniSprintEna: If enabled, you could sprint anyway.
cheatdetector.config.fixes.packetFixEnab:
In order to avoid being flagged by an server-side anti-cheat error, should we fix some abnormal packets? 
This may affect the normal operation of some Mods, so please don't use it if you haven't encountered the error flag.
cheatdetector.config.fixes.packetFixMode:
NORMAL: Fix some packets that may flag, most anti-cheats will not flag. 
STRICT: Fix all known packets that may flag, some features of the Mod are affected.
cheatdetector.config.fixes.vulcanDisable:
You need to have a trident containing the Riptide enchantment in your secondary handheld to disable movement detection. 
This module was designed for Vulcan 2.7.5 and doesn't seem to work with newer Vulcan. 
 Thanks to @§nCCBlueX§r .
cheatdetector.config.fixes.vulcanOmniSpr:
[Old Vulcan] Disable OmniSprint Check.
Thanks to @§nAlan34§r .
cheatdetector.config.modules.flagDetecto:
If enabled, we will try to detect server-side anti-cheat setbacks and guess the flags through them.
Note that if anti-cheat chooses to silent flag, it won't work.
cheatdetector.config.modules.noRotateSet: If enabled, your rotation won't be mod by server.
cheatdetector.config.modules.spinEnabled: If enabled, you will spinning like a hacker.
cheatdetector.config.modules.clickGUIEna: Show a ClickGui to config mod.
cheatdetector.config.modules.antiVanishE: If enabled, we will notice you if someone just vanished.
cheatdetector.config.modules.blinkEnable: If enabled, we will pause your packet send task.
cheatdetector.config.modules.airWalkEnab: If enabled, you could walk in the air
cheatdetector.config.modules.antiFallEna: If enabled, we will clutch you if you fall.
cheatdetector.gui.title: CheatDetector 2.1.1
